price: Warri isaaniin duraa sobsiisaniiti, adabbiin gara isaan hin beekneen isaanitti dhufe.
arabic: كَذَّبَ ٱلَّذِينَ مِن قَبۡلِهِمۡ فَأَتَىٰهُمُ ٱلۡعَذَابُ مِنۡ حَيۡثُ لَا يَشۡعُرُونَ

version.title: Oromo translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Oromo by Ghaly Ababour Abaghuna, printed in 2009.

meta.transliteration: kadhaba alladhīna min qablihim fa-atāhumu al-ʿadhābu min ḥaythu lā yashʿurūna
